verbs.description: [V: Imagine] [ARG1: this] [ARGM-PRP: for the child you were] . Filmmaker Ava DuVernay wrote these words on Twitter Tuesday night , and shared a childhood picture of herself and her mom , inspiring thousands of others to do the same in protest of the Trump Administration family separation policy .
